localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.
blogPost.body: Ojoy enlarges low-resolution photos and memoji and improves their quality. It does this 100% in the browser client-side, thanks to some smarts from Upscaler and TensorFlow.js. The output is typically sharper compared to just resizing them.
blogPost.title: Ojoy - Enlarge low-resolution images and improve their quality
blogPost.author: Addy Osmani

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和备忘录，并提高其质量。由于 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在浏览器客户端实现了这一点。与仅仅调整它们的大小相比，输出的图像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率图像并提高其质量。

localize.description: Ojoy可以放大低分辨率的照片和備忘錄，並提高其質量。由於 Upscaler 和 TensorFlow.js 的一些智能，它 100% 在瀏覽器客戶端實現了這一點。與僅僅調整它們的大小相比，輸出的圖像通常更加清晰。
localize.tagline: 放大低分辨率圖像並提高其質量。

previous.excerpt: With this new Zapier plugin, Bubble apps can create both “triggers” or “actions” for a Zap. This lets you do everything from trigger workflows to add, delete, and modify things in your Bubble app database with any web service in Zapier’s extensive library.
previous.title: Official Bubble Zapier Integration - Connect any web service to a no-code web app.

localize.description: 通过这个新的Zapier插件，Bubble应用程序可以为Zap创建 "触发器 "或 "动作"。这让你可以通过Zapier广泛的库中的任何网络服务，在你的Bubble应用数据库中完成从触发工作流到添加、删除和修改事物的一切工作。
localize.tagline: 将任何网络服务连接到一个无代码的网络应用。

localize.description: 通過這個新的Zapier插件，Bubble應用程序可以爲Zap創建 "觸發器 "或 "動作"。這讓你可以通過Zapier廣泛的庫中的任何網絡服務，在你的Bubble應用數據庫中完成從觸發工作流到添加、刪除和修改事物的一切工作。
localize.tagline: 將任何網絡服務連接到一個無代碼的網絡應用。

next.excerpt: Repl.it Teams for Education is a real-time collaborative coding environment for teachers and students to write code in 50+ languages. Teachers can create curriculum, facilitate pair-coding groups, provide instant code feedback with annotations and autograding.
next.title: Repl.it Teams for Education - Zero-setup collaborative cloud IDE for teachers and students

localize.description: Repl.it Teams for Education是一个实时协作的编码环境，教师和学生可以用50多种语言编写代码。教师可以创建课程，促进配对编码组，提供即时代码反馈与注释和签名。
localize.tagline: 为教师和学生提供零设置的协作式云IDE

localize.description: Repl.it Teams for Education是一個實時協作的編碼環境，教師和學生可以用50多種語言編寫代碼。教師可以創建課程，促進配對編碼組，提供即時代碼反饋與註釋和簽名。
localize.tagline: 爲教師和學生提供零設置的協作式雲IDE
